title: 6 people shot at Harrington party
content:
Six people were shot Sunday at a party in Harrington, police said.
The incident was reported about 1 a.m. in the 100 block of East St.
City police, assisted by officers from several other police agencies, arrived to find between 200 and 300 people at a party in the house where the shootings occurred, Lt. Earl K. Brode said.
As they continued to investigate, police learned that all of those who were shot already had been taken to area hospitals, Brode said.
Police also determined that none of their injuries were life-threatening, he said. No other information was released about those who were injured.
"The investigation is in its preliminary stages and no suspects have been identified at this point in the investigation," Brode said.
Anyone with information about the shooting is asked to call the Harrington Police Department at (302) 398-4493 or give tips to Delaware Crime Stoppers at (800) TIP-3333 and www.tipsubmit.com.
Contact robin brown at (302) 324-2856 or rbrown@delawareonline.com. Find her on Facebook and follow her on Twitter @rbrowndelaware.
